## Description {#details}

## Public Member Functions

### disconnect() {#a2aad700be22e6ac875d538a01e267d74}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::orc::FDSimpleRemoteEPCTransport::disconnect ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Trigger disconnection from the transport.

The implementation should respond by calling handleDisconnect on the client once disconnection is complete. May be called more than once and from different threads.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h">SimpleRemoteEPCUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/lib/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-cpp/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/lib/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-cpp">SimpleRemoteEPCUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### sendMessage() {#ac70eafd527c133cbc9773c9237179b17}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::orc::FDSimpleRemoteEPCTransport::sendMessage (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/orc/#a1448b52253eb43f8f07b7f5d94336a47">SimpleRemoteEPCOpcode</a> OpC, uint64&#95;t SeqNo, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> TagAddr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; char &gt; ArgBytes)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Send a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/simpleremoteepc">SimpleRemoteEPC</a> message.

This function may be called concurrently. Subclasses should implement locking if required for the underlying transport.

### start() {#a6e8f262aaaac4d6d07b00f3e16510383}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Error llvm::orc::FDSimpleRemoteEPCTransport::start ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Called during setup of the client to indicate that the client is ready to receive messages.

Transport objects should not access the client until this method is called.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-h">SimpleRemoteEPCUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/lib/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-cpp/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/lib/executionengine/orc/shared/simpleremoteepcutils-cpp">SimpleRemoteEPCUtils.cpp</a>.
